mapper.select: select s.id, s.sys, s.title, s.owner, s.goods_sale_count, s.goods_buy_count, s.total_buy_cost, s.total_buy_count, s.total_sale_cost, s.total_sale_count, s.total_cost, s.updated, s.icon from taobao_shop s where deleted = 0 order by s.total_cost desc limit #{offset}, #{count}

select si.id, si.shop_id, si.type, si.price, si.count, si.max_count, si.item, si.total_deal_cost, si.total_deal_count, si.`order` from taobao_shop_item si left join taobao_shop s on s.id = si.shop_id where si.deleted = 0 and s.deleted = 0 and s.owner = #{owner} and si.type = #{type} order by si.`order` asc limit #{offset}, #{count}

select si.id, si.shop_id, si.type, si.price, si.count, si.max_count, si.item, si.total_deal_cost, si.total_deal_count, si.`order`, s.owner from taobao_shop_item si left join taobao_shop s on s.id = si.shop_id where si.deleted = 0 and s.deleted = 0 and si.id = #{shopItemId}
mapper.update: update taobao_shop_item set TOTAL_DEAL_COST = (select _cost.v from (select IFNULL(sum(dl.cost), 0) as v from taobao_shop_item _si left join taobao_deal_log dl on dl.shop_item_id = _si.id where _si.id = #{shopItemId} and _si.deleted = 0 and dl.deleted = 0 group by _si.id) as _cost), TOTAL_DEAL_COUNT = (select _count.v from (select IFNULL(sum(dl.count), 0) as v from taobao_shop_item _si left join taobao_deal_log dl on dl.shop_item_id = _si.id where _si.id = #{shopItemId} and _si.deleted = 0 and dl.deleted = 0 group by _si.id) as _count), `COUNT` = #{count} where id = #{shopItemId} and deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into taobao_deal_log (shop_id, shot_item_type, shop_item_id, player, count, cost, tax, day, created) values (#{shopId}, #{type}, #{shopItemId}, #{player}, #{count}, #{cost}, #{tax}, #{day}, now())
mapper.select: select si.id, si.shop_id, si.type, si.price, si.count, si.max_count, si.item, si.total_deal_cost, si.total_deal_count, si.`order`, s.owner from taobao_shop_item si left join taobao_shop s on s.id = si.shop_id where si.deleted = 0 and s.deleted = 0 and si.shop_id = #{shopId} and si.type = #{type} and si.`order` = #{order}
select s.id from taobao_shop s where s.owner = #{owner} and s.deleted = 0

select s.id, s.owner, s.icon, s.title, s.updated, s.total_cost, s.total_sale_count, s.total_sale_cost, s.total_buy_count, s.total_buy_cost, s.goods_buy_count, s.goods_sale_count, s.sys from taobao_shop s where s.id = #{id} and s.deleted = 0
select IFNULL(max(`order`), 0) from taobao_shop_item where shop_id = #{id} and type = #{type} and deleted = 0
mapper.insert: insert into taobao_shop_item (shop_id, type, price, count, max_count, item, total_deal_count, total_deal_cost, `order`, created) values (#{shopId}, #{type}, #{price}, #{count}, #{maxCount}, #{item}, #{totalDealCount}, #{totalDealCost}, #{order} , now())

insert into taobao_shop (sys, owner, title, icon, goods_sale_count, goods_buy_count, total_sale_count, total_sale_cost, total_buy_count, total_buy_cost, total_cost, created) values (#{sys}, #{owner}, #{title}, #{icon}, #{goodsSaleCount}, #{goodsBuyCount}, #{totalSaleCount}, #{totalSaleCost}, #{totalBuyCount}, #{totalBuyCost}, #{totalCost}, now())
mapper.select: select si.id, si.shop_id, si.type, si.price, si.count, si.max_count, si.item, si.total_deal_cost, si.total_deal_count, si.`order`, s.owner from taobao_shop_item si left join taobao_shop s on s.id = si.shop_id where si.deleted = 0 and s.deleted = 0 and si.id = #{shopItemId} for update
select IFNULL(s.sys, 0) from taobao_shop s where s.id = #{shopId} and s.deleted = 0

select IFNULL(sum(dl.cost), 0) from taobao_deal_log dl left join taobao_shop s on s.id = dl.shop_id where dl.player = #{player} and dl.deleted = 0 and s.deleted = 0 and s.sys = 1 and dl.shot_item_type = 'buy' and dl.day = current_date()
mapper.update: update taobao_shop set goods_buy_count = (select count(*) from taobao_shop_item where deleted = 0 and shop_id = #{shopId} and `type` = 'buy' ), goods_sale_count = (select count(*) from taobao_shop_item where deleted = 0 and shop_id = #{shopId} and `type` = 'sale' ), total_buy_count = (select IFNULL(sum(total_deal_count), 0) from taobao_shop_item where deleted = 0 and shop_id = #{shopId} and `type` = 'buy' ), total_sale_count = (select IFNULL(sum(total_deal_count), 0) from taobao_shop_item where deleted = 0 and shop_id = #{shopId} and `type` = 'sale' ), total_buy_cost = (select IFNULL(sum(total_deal_cost), 0) from taobao_shop_item where deleted = 0 and shop_id = #{shopId} and `type` = 'buy' ), total_sale_cost = (select IFNULL(sum(total_deal_cost), 0) from taobao_shop_item where deleted = 0 and shop_id = #{shopId} and `type` = 'sale' ), total_cost = (select IFNULL(sum(total_deal_cost), 0) from taobao_shop_item where deleted = 0 and shop_id = #{shopId} ) where id = #{shopId}
